DOC.brief_summary: Test evaluate new diagnostic method ( SRM-MS/MS : Selected Reaction Monitoring- Mass spectrometry ) Lyme Borreliosis human skin biopsy . Patients include early skin manifestation ( erythema migrans ) . This new proteomic method compare two exist method : culture Borrelia PCR detection Borrelia ( DNA detection bacteria ) .
